messages.content: What are the subdistricts of the Linghe District?

I apologize, but I do not have enough information to identify the subdistricts within the Linghe District. Districts and subdistricts can vary significantly between different countries and regions, and without more context about the location of Linghe District, I cannot determine its subdivisions.

Okay, with the additional context that Linghe District is located within Jinzhou city, Liaoning province in China, I believe the subdistricts (or towns) within Linghe District are:

• Linghe Subdistrict - includes Linghe town and Dongling village

• Xinan Subdistrict - includes Xinan town and Xin'an village

• Xinglong Subdistrict - includes Xinglong town and Xinglong village

• Beizhen Subdistrict - includes Beizhen town and Beizhen village

• Xigu Subdistrict - includes Xigu town and Xigu village 

• Xiangyang Subdistrict - includes Xiangyang town and Xiangyang village

• Yanzi Subdistrict - includes Yanzi town and Yanzi village

• Shaling Subdistrict - includes Shaling town and Shaling village

• Shuangta Subdistrict - includes Shuangta town and Shuangta village

• Xinfu Subdistrict - includes Xinfu town and Xinfu village

However, without looking up official government sources, I cannot say with certainty that this list of subdistricts and towns within Linghe District is complete or fully accurate. Please double check this information if you need precise details.
